featuredArticle.title: Federal Reserve Holds Interest Rates Steady as Markets Rebound
featuredArticle.excerpt: The U.S. Federal Reserve has kept interest rates unchanged, signaling a cautious approach amid slowing inflation and resilient labor markets. Global equities climbed as investors welcomed the decision, while bond yields edged lower.
